entity.name: Hunt and Johnson's final public debate
entity.description: The Conservative leadership hopefuls are being grilled by readers of The Sun newspaper. It is the pair's last chance to debate each other in front of the general public before polls close. One of the two candidates will be named the prime minister of the UK within the next week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@Haggis_UK The reason why our airports & ports remained open to #COVID19 HOTSPOTS is down to one person & one person only- #BorisJohnson. He angrily dismissed any idea of this & put 'economy before lives'. If he had any honour or decency he would apologise & resign.
https://t.co/2ih9DkyJsp
